Lets

CONN = string(getEnv("DB_CONNECTION", getCurrentDir() / "db.sqlite3"))
USER = string(getEnv("DB_USER", ""))
PASSWORD = string(getEnv("DB_PASSWORD", ""))
DATABASE = string(getEnv("DB_DATABASE", ""))
MAX_CONNECTION = parseInt(getEnv("DB_MAX_CONNECTION", "1"))
IS_DISPLAY = if existsEnv("LOG_IS_DISPLAY"): parseBool(
    string(getEnv("LOG_IS_DISPLAY", ""))) else: false
IS_FILE = if existsEnv("LOG_IS_FILE"): parseBool(
    string(getEnv("LOG_IS_FILE", ""))) else: false
LOG_DIR = if existsEnv("LOG_DIR"): string(getEnv("LOG_DIR", "")) else: ""

Consts

DRIVER = "sqlite"
